text: The response time from aelf Ventures typically ranges from 3-5 business days, during which you will be informed about the next steps. The overall timeframe for the investment process, from the initial submission to the final disbursement, may vary depending on the volume of applications and the specifics of your project. We appreciate your patience, as the review process requires thorough evaluation to ensure a comprehensive assessment.
title: How long does it take to hear back from aelf ventures?
